message22
Prinny: The Nether Institute, Evil Academy is back, in the world of "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," which was released for the PlayStation®3, dood!
Prinny: L'Evil Academy est de retour, dans le monde de "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice", qui est sortie sur PlayStation®3, mec.
プリニー: PlayStation®3で発売された「魔界戦記ディスガイア３」の舞台、「魔立邪悪学園」を再現したッス！
프리니: PlayStation®3로 발매된「마계전기 디스가이아 3」의 무대,「마립 사악학원」을 재현했슴다!
Prinny: The Nether Institute, Evil Academy is back, in the world of "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," which was released for the PlayStation®3, dood!
Prinny：PlayStation®3的「魔界戰記Disgaea 3」舞台「魔立邪惡學園」在此重現了喔！
Prinny：PlayStation®3的「魔界戰記Disgaea 3」舞台「魔立邪惡學園」在此重現了喔！
Prinny: The Nether Institute, Evil Academy is back, in the world of "Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice," which was released for the PlayStation®3, dood!
message23
Prinny: Seems like they're still setting up, dood...
Prinny: On dirait qu'ils sont encore en train de se préparer, mec…
プリニー: まだ準備中のところもあるみたいッスけど…
프리니: 아직 준비중인 곳도 있는 것 같슴다만…
Prinny: Seems like they're still setting up, dood...
Prinny：好像還在準備中喔…。
Prinny：好像還在準備中喔…。
Prinny: Seems like they're still setting up, dood...
message31
Prinny: Check the left display for a fun mini game called "Disgaea Test," dood!
Prinny: Regardez la vitrine à gauche pour un mini jeu amusant appelé "Disgaea Test", mec!
プリニー: 左手のディスプレイでは、ミニゲーム「ディスガイア検定」が楽しめるッス！
프리니: 왼쪽 디스플레이에서는 미니게임「디스가이아 검정」을 즐길 수 있슴다!
Prinny: Check the left display for a fun mini game called "Disgaea Test," dood!
Prinny：左手邊的螢幕可以享受迷你遊戲「Disgaea檢定」喔！
Prinny：左手邊的螢幕可以享受迷你遊戲「Disgaea檢定」喔！
Prinny: Check the left display for a fun mini game called "Disgaea Test," dood!
message32
Prinny: Check the right display to see a great promotional video for game titles, dood!
Prinny: Regardez la vitrine à droite pour voir des vidéos promotionnelles de nos jeux, mec!
プリニー: 右手のディスプレイでは、新作タイトルのプロモーション映像が見られるッスよ！
프리니: 오른쪽 디스플레이에서는 신작 타이틀의 프로모션 영상을 볼 수 있슴다!
Prinny: Check the right display to see a great promotional video for game titles, dood!
Prinny：右手邊的螢幕可以看到遊戲的宣傳影片喔！
Prinny：右手邊的螢幕可以看到遊戲的宣傳影片喔！
Prinny: Check the right display to see a great promotional video for game titles, dood!

message41
Prinny: You can also check the door at the far end to go to Mao's Room, dood!
Prinny: Vous pouvez aussi aller dans la Chambre de Mao grâce à la porte du fond, mec!
プリニー: あと、一番奥にある扉からはマオぼっちゃまの部屋に行けるッス！
프리니: 그리고, 가장 안 쪽에 있는 문으로는 마오 도련님의 방으로 갈 수 있슴다!
Prinny: You can also check the door at the far end to go to Mao's Room, dood!
Prinny：還有，從最裡面的那扇門通往Mao少爺的房間喔！

Prinny: You can also check the door at the far end to go to Mao's Room, dood!
message42
Prinny: There are so many games and toys scattered around here. What a mess, dood!
Prinny: Il y a des jouets partout. Quel bordel, mec!
プリニー: ゲームやオモチャがいっぱいで、ちらかり放題ッス…
프리니: 무지 많은 게임이나 장난감이 널브러저 있슴다…
Prinny: There are so many games and toys scattered around here. What a mess, dood!
Prinny：有一堆遊戲跟玩具，雜亂無章喔…。
